newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turk Tupras buys 52kt gasoline, sells 22kt naphtha.
newsitem.headline: Turk Tupras buys 52kt gasoline, sells 22kt naphtha.

text.p: Turkey's state oil refiner Tupras said on Monday it was importing 52,000 tonnes of gasoline and exporting 22,000 tonnes of naphtha under recent tenders.
It said in a statement it was importing 27,000 tonnes of gasoline from Poten on June 11-14 from the port of Constanza at a discount of $17.35 per tonne.
It said it would import a further 25,000 tonnes from Vitol also from Constanza on June 6-8 at a discount of $17.50 per tonne.
The 22,000-tonne naphtha export to Poten would be made on June 10-15 at a premium of $6 per tonne.
All prices are based on fob Mediterranean Italy quotations.
Tupras held the tenders on May 21 and May 27 respectively.
